dandiset.description: The unique identifier for your Dandiset. Can also be created or searched by name.

number_of_jobs.title: Job Count
number_of_jobs.description:
The number of files to upload in parallel.
⚠️ Use With Caution: Setting this value above one has resulted in unpreditable behaviors (runaway processes, segmentation errors, etc.) on several systems

number_of_threads.title: Threads per Job
number_of_threads.description: The number of threads to handle each file.
